title: 50 Years Ago, Discovery Of This Fossil Changed Understanding Of Evolution
content: A fossilised skeleton, Australopithecus afarensis, best known by her nickname 'Lucy', was unearthed by researchers 50 years ago this month in the Afar region of Ethiopia.
summary: A fossilised skeleton, Australopithecus afarensis, best known by her nickname 'Lucy', was unearthed by researchers 50 years ago this month in the Afar region of Ethiopia.

title: South Korea's 'Morphing Wheel' Could Make Wheelchairs Climb Stairs
content: The morphing wheel consists of an outer hoop of a chain and a series of spoke wires running through the hub.
summary: The morphing wheel consists of an outer hoop of a chain and a series of spoke wires running through the hub.

title: Chinese Woman's Illegal Surrogacy Case Sparks Debate Online
content: A 22-year-old Chinese woman's account of how she was lured into the country's illegal surrogacy industry before suffering a miscarriage went viral on Chinese social media this week.

title: Dominica To Award Its Highest National Honour To PM Modi
content: The Commonwealth of Dominica will honour Prime Minister Narendra Modi with its highest national award, the Dominica Award of Honour, in recognition of his contributions to Dominica during the COVID-19 pandemic.
summary: The Commonwealth of Dominica will honour Prime Minister Narendra Modi with its highest national award, the Dominica Award of Honour, in recognition of his contributions to Dominica during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: "Quite Disturbing": Human Head Found On Popular Tourist Beach In Florida
content: Locals said the disturbing find has left them traumatised, with some saying that they are now too scared to go to the beach.

title: Meet The 35-Year-Old YouTuber Who Is Exploring What It Means To Be A Man
content: A YouTuber recently embarked on a new chapter of his life as a transgender man. Ash Perez, a member of the online content creators community Try Guys, documented his journey of exploration of masculinity in a video series called New Guy Tries.
summary: A YouTuber recently embarked on a new chapter of his life as a transgender man. Ash Perez, a member of the online content creators community Try Guys, documented his journey of exploration of masculinity in a video series called New Guy Tries.

title: How Much Money Do You Need To Afford A House In US
content: Want to buy a home in the United States? Well, think about it only if you earn at least $1,08,000 (around Rs 91.15 lakh) or more, a report said.
summary: Want to buy a home in the United States? Well, think about it only if you earn at least $1,08,000 (around Rs 91.15 lakh) or more, a report said.

title: 5 Facts About Marco Rubio, Donald Trumps Pick For US Secretary Of State
content: US President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Florida Senator Marco Rubio, a prominent critic of China, for the position of US Secretary of State.

title: How A Brooklyn Neighbourhood Gave Rise To The Dreaded New York Mafia
content: Red Hook, a neighbourhood in southwestern Brooklyn famous for its diverse community and unique geography today, was once among the most stigmatised places for its crime and extreme violence, according to a new book.

title: Flights To Bali Resume Following Volcanic Eruption
content: Several airlines resumed flights to Bali on Thursday, after cancelling trips to and from the Indonesian resort island due to huge eruptions at a nearby volcano.

title: "Make It Fiction...": Elon Musk Makes 'Orwell' Jab At Senior NATO Official

title: World's Longest Nonstop Flights To Get $821 Million Luxury Upgrade
content: The world's longest nonstop commercial flights are getting a major upgrade. Singapore Airlines (SIA) recently announced a multi-year program worth 1.1 billion Singapore dollars (about $821 million).

title: Bob Lee's Accused Killer Says Tech Executive "Went Crazy On Me"
content: Technology executive Bob Lee's accused killer told a jury he acted in self-defense after Lee tried to attack him with a knife on a San Francisco street a year and a half ago, saying "he went crazy on me" after losing his temper.

title: This US County Switched To 32-Hour Workweek Last Year. Here Are The Results
content: San Juan County in Washington has reported an 85.5% spike in job applications, with open positions getting filled 23.75% faster after it shifted to the 32-hour workweek last year.
summary: San Juan County in Washington has reported an 85.5% spike in job applications, with open positions getting filled 23.75% faster after it shifted to the 32-hour workweek last year.

title: Biden, Xi To Meet In Peru This Week As World Leaders Shift Focus To Trump
content: US President Joe Biden will meet his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping, in Peru on Saturday for the last of three in-person sit-downs between the leaders during the US president's term in office.
summary: US President Joe Biden will meet his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping, in Peru on Saturday for the last of three in-person sit-downs between the leaders during the US president's term in office.
